languages.text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] When wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy in the {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g} all allies adjacent to the wielder gets temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in amount of wielders (Wil {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + Fel bonus) and make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by wielder

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

languages.text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，邻近的所有盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63}，同时对装备者击中的敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，邻近的所有盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>，同时对装备者击中的敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，邻近的所有盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63}，同时对装备者击中的敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}内の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、着用者に隣接する全ての味方は{uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63}一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を得て、着用者が命中した敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接範囲{/g}内の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、着用者に隣接する全ての味方は<u>（着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}＋{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）の</u>一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を受け、着用者が命中した敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo alcanzado por el portador.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del portador)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo alcanzado por el portador.

Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el enemigo alcanzado por el portador.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhalten alle Verbündeten neben dem Träger {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und führen gegen den vom Träger getroffenen Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} aus.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, und zwar auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, erlangen sämtliche an den Träger angrenzenden Verbündeten <u>(Träger-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und führen gegen den vom Träger getroffenen Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} aus.

Wenn der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, und zwar auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, erlangen sämtliche an den Träger angrenzenden Verbündeten {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und führen gegen den vom Träger getroffenen Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} aus.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, все союзники на соседних клетках с персонажем получают {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против того же самого противника.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, все союзники на соседних клетках с персонажем получают <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} персонажа + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g} против того же самого противника.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, все союзники на соседних клетках с персонажем получают <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} персонажа + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаку по возможности{/g} против того же самого противника.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, все союзники на соседних клетках с персонажем получают {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против того же самого противника.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g}, tous les alliés adjacents à l'utilisateur bénéficient de {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre l'ennemi touché par l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} un ennemi à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}, tous les alliés adjacents à l'utilisateur bénéficient de <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'utilisateur)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre l'ennemi touché par l'utilisateur.

Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}, tous les alliés adjacents à l'utilisateur bénéficient de {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre l'ennemi touché par l'utilisateur.
